item.description:
Through meditation you can

Transform fear into love, anger into compassion, and sadness into joy.

We all have fears, get angry, and feel sad from time to time. But we don’t have to be ruled by these emotions. In this interactive workshop, Jim will engage you through a series of exercises designed to reveal the power of meditation to transform these negative feelings into their opposites. Through several meditation periods, you will also have a chance to experience meditation as a key to a rich inner life. As always, this program is free. Join us at 9:30am for a light complimentary breakfast.

Facilitator: Jim Rose, M.Ed.

If you have ever attended one of Jim’s workshops, you know how special they are. A former vice-president with Johnson and Johnson, Jim has led corporate workshops all over the globe. He was recognized by Human Resources Executive magazine as one of the top HR executives in the US.

Jim also facilitates programs for Science of Spirituality worldwide, and we are delighted to welcome him back to Boston.

This program includes a complimentary light breakfast.

See our New England Calendar and visit our new website.

Please do not park in Center’s driveway. There is free parking on the street.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in Nordic Hall, immediately to the right of the entrance.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: Transformation through Meditation
